website_summaries.verdict: Take your artisan loaf to a whole new level with the decorative bread stencils included in this proofing basket set.
pros: Includes rattan bread proofing basket, dough scraper, cloth liner
6 design stencils and a digital eBook
Basket made from natural, organic materials
Wicks out excess moisture while proofing
Helps your bread look like a pro made it
cons: Occasional splinters, but you can, proof with the cover on to prevent this

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Received my basket set and two extra stencils were included! Thank you for the surprise. All that is shown is in the package, stencils, scraper, basket and cloth cover. E recipes emailed. Made some basic white bread and tossed the cornmeal inside to do final proofing. After proofing stenciled with white flour and baked. The only thing I would've done differently, put the seam of the bread on side, dust with cocoa powder (sellers advice) and brush off the cornmeal (excess took away from the decoration stencil) Thank you for this new chapter in my bread making journey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: The basket is just beautiful! It leaves a lovely pattern on bread dough
customer_reviews.text: The basket is just beautiful! It leaves a lovely pattern on bread dough. So light due to being made with wood reed, it has a liner too which hangs just above the bottom of the bowl.Now i feel like a pro! i used a very sticky dough to test it out with some oil spray and a good dusting with brown rise flour. The dough fell out so easily i almost dropped it. The rings of flour on the loaf looked fantastic. Well worth the investment! I took a loaf to friends dinner party last night, it was the talk of the meal, with everyone taking pictures of it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie I

customer_reviews.title: Accessories for the Romertopf roaster
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these accessories meant to be used with a Romertopf clay roaster. My daughter-in-law asked for the Romertopf roaster and I was thrilled to oblige as she will shyly ask for things for her children but never for her. So when she requested this clay baking pot, I knew she really wanted it. This review is based mostly on what she told me after getting her Romertopf. She's enjoyed using these accessories with her Romertopf, depending on the recipe. I'm not sure they'd be useful with any other kind of roasting pan. The food the Romertopf produces is delicious, and the accessories make cooking with it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: My bread looks professional!
customer_reviews.text: Love this proofing basket! It helped make my homemade sourdough bread look artisanal. Would definitely recommmend. The bonus items that came with the basket were a nice surprise too!
customer_reviews.author: ValerieTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice proofing basket. The stencils are wonderful and the e-book is very helpful. Since it was on sale, it was definitely worth it. I am not sure for me that it would be if it were regular price. We just bake at home so there is no need to sink a lot of money into supplies. However, everything was very nice quality and if you knew you would use it a lot, then it might be worth the regular price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for those new to break making
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to bread making and in the process of gathering the proper equipment. From everything I’ve read about making artisan breads, the basket size is perfect. It seems sturdy and well made. The free download from their website offers great suggestions and recipes. I’m so looking forward to using this! As a note of caution for novice bread makers like me who hadn’t a clue what a lame was. I thought it was an item for scraping gooey dough off one’s fingers. So, be very careful when opening it and get your fingers well out of the way! As a side note, this seller provides excellent, prompt, and caring customer service. I highly recommend them and their products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good kit.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good kit. The “bowl scraper” is not really well shaped for “scraping a bowl”. It is however a nice shape for working dough on a bench or countertop. The basket and cloth work pretty well. I think others would give it five stars, I am not however motivated to do that at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Carpenter John

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying a bowl scraper separately, as the one provided is square and inflexible, and therefore not a good bowl scraper. Other than that, the items are all as described, and the bowl, liner, and lame are well-made and serve their function well.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Gailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these proofing baskets (I purchased 2 of the same one) to add to my selection. These are well made and imprinted nicely on my bread. The additional items of the scraper, stencils, and lame also add to my arsenal of equipment for bread baking. I would buy more baskets from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle book lover

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but you get a bunch of extras
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but you get a bunch of extras. The basket is great, I've used it with and without the linen liner. It will take a little while to get the knack of using the stencils neatly. The plastic dough scraper wasn't necessary – – anybody wanting a Banneton basket would probably already have one. The ebook is really neat.
customer_reviews.author: thomas butler

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Love this set for a great price. Has almost everything you need to start making bread at home. Basket was a little smaller than I thought, but works with regular or small loafs. Comes with cute stencils for a flour pattern and a scorer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bread
customer_reviews.text: I thought the bowl would have been larger. I liked the product but, I wish I would had bought two bowls. I have had used this 4 times in the last 2 weeks. I Love how the bread comes out. I could not provide a picture because the bread is gone so quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Burch

customer_reviews.title: Loved it and what a deal
customer_reviews.text: Loved it and what a deal! ... this is the real deal and perfect for 250 gr of flour bread - they e-mailed me a recipe too! ... fantastic service and very good product
customer_reviews.author: cameliaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! The bread came out amazing and I loved the fact that they sent me a recipe to try it out and some stensils to decorate the bread. At first, I thought the basket would be flimsy but is actually pretty strong. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Misael

customer_reviews.title: So, so ....
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have retired, I have begun baking bread again. I thought this would be a nice addition to my bread baking accessories. Maybe it would be but it is rather small. I will probably use it as a bread basket.
customer_reviews.author: JLBRN

customer_reviews.title: Good looking basket
customer_reviews.text: Good looking basket. I use them for making sourdough bread, and my bakes come out looking very professional. Haven't had any problem unmolding bread after proofing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product that I am very happy with!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Bought this beautiful and reasonably priced bread form and love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this beautiful and reasonably priced bread form and love it! It is just the right size to bake a 1.5 pound round loaf. The basket is well-made, and the stencils are a wonderful surprise. My bread comes out so professional looking, I LOVE to make bread even more than I did before.
customer_reviews.author: tomsgal09

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful basket bread proofs fantastic love the ridges Made strong. Can't wait to use it again. Will purchase from them again
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Callaway

customer_reviews.title: a nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: i was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this package as well as the speed at which it was delivered. thank you, Brotss!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Use it to proof bread. Wish they had a double pack as usually need two
customer_reviews.author: Christina Townsend

customer_reviews.title: It worked perfect and beautiful and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I used this brotss Banneton Proofing Basket for the first time yesterday. It worked perfect and beautiful and I love it. Also I love the gift, the dough cutter which is exactly what I was looking for and the beautiful stencils and the ebook which I didn't down load yet tough. I was lucky to find this.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Your bowl is sturdier and without a lot of curing worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a proofing bowl from a flour company and had problems with the dough sticking. Your bowl is sturdier and without a lot of curing worked great!
customer_reviews.author: aged hippie

customer_reviews.title: Great proofing basket!
customer_reviews.text: Came as described and very nice quality for proofing basket. It even came with some forms for dough patterns and an e-book! Lovely tool that I've already used for 2 sessions of bread-making.
customer_reviews.author: Joy M johnson

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son for his birthday. I have not gotten feed back on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Buy this basket!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled by this proofing basket and all the goodies inside. It's the perfect size for making sourdough at home 😃 I will definitely be back for more baking supplies
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic basket and the extras are such a nice touch
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic basket and the extras are such a nice touch! Works wonderfully with my yeast breads. Very happy, will probably order a larger basket now.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I bought two other brands of banneton baskets at the same time, but these are by far my favorites. Flour coats them well and there is virtually no sticking and my artisan bread now has an appropriate shape and rise every time. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: The basket is very well made. You really need to flour it a lot or it can stick to it. I used it without the liner. Overall it is a great basket.
customer_reviews.author: peggy criswell

customer_reviews.title: Cute lil basket
customer_reviews.text: Cute lil proofing basket. You almost have to throw it in the wash after each use. That's the only inconvenient part if you bake more than once a week
customer_reviews.author: Big Sur coast

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the basket at the extras including the lame and the stencils. I've used the basket several times and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: T. Caraher

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basket and the stencils are great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality basket and makes beautiful designs in the bread. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Sourdough bread proofed in the BossSS Banneton
customer_reviews.text: This Banneton is easy to use and the Bread Lame, and scraper as well as the stencils are great extra items in this complete kit!!, Great item

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who is just getting in to bread making. He loves the product! He has used it several times, and is very pleased with it. We would recommend it. The shipping was quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Perfect for an amateur baker and I love the stencils. @risingnutrition
customer_reviews.author: sarah provence

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! My wife is delving into bread making ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! My wife is delving into bread making and this put the biggest smile on her face! She absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy I ordered this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set! High quality and the bread looks fantastic! Love the stencils!
customer_reviews.author: Nail Diva

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The Banneton is great, very well made. The value with the included stencils, liner, dough scraper, and ebook make this a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great proofing basket
customer_reviews.text: Used this a couple of times for proofing my Einkorn and Kamut sourdough bread. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Carin

customer_reviews.title: She's been absolutely happy with it so far and loved the flour stencils ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really lovely proofing basket! I purchased it as a gift for my girlfriend who is making a foray into bread baking. She's been absolutely happy with it so far and loved the flour stencils as well.
customer_reviews.author: Colin B Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made a great design on the bread ! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Sholl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent basket for sour dough breads
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly what I've expected. Before I got this basket my bread was not that good. I used the basket without a cloth liner, it is enough to dust basket a bit extra. Liner may be used to cover the basket while improving the dough. I am very pleased with the result, and I am going to use this basket every time. Probably I will buy anther basket.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Banneton
customer_reviews.text: I love this banneton! I was worried about it being the correct size that I needed. Fortunately, it works perfect for recipes in the 400 - 500g of flour range, which is exactly what I wanted. I've used it with great success both with and without the cloth. I will be purchasing another one in the near future so I can have multiple loaves going at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: It was a lovely Basket and everything with it---I returned it as it was a little smaller than what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: P. F. Hummel

customer_reviews.title: good support and easy to use and understand, a great intro to breadmaking!!
customer_reviews.text: very easy as a starter for artisan bread and the recipe is awesome, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: sliverspurs

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this product. It made our life a lot easier. Quality is superb. Delivery was spotless. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nazmi M. Talimcioglu

customer_reviews.title: Could have included some instructions about flouring, cleaning, ...
customer_reviews.text: Could have included some instructions about flouring, cleaning, etc. Had to look it up on YouTube since it was the first time I tried making bread.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic,
customer_reviews.text: I have make artisan bread and there's a lot more coming in. This product is fantastic,
customer_reviews.author: --- Angel ---

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great transaction, great product. I will be sticking with your products in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Good Proofing Basket
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a good proofing Basket. Worth the buy. The only thing i didnt like is the lame has a slight curve in it but that is not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the extras that came with this! Makes a beautiful boule!
customer_reviews.author: Sissy J.

customer_reviews.title: I can’t say enough great things about this product
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough great things about this product! Sturdy, arrives on time, and wonderful customer service. If you’re looking for a great breadmaking product look no further! Brotss is where it’s at! AMAZING!

customer_reviews.title: First Banneton and Loving It
customer_reviews.text: My first banneton and have been using it every week for my sourdough baking! the size is just nice for 500-600gm dough
customer_reviews.author: Cris de Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Easy & good product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Comes with stencils and an eBook! I’ve already made several loaves using this bread proofing basket. It’s sturdy, easy to clean and great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Sky Mast

customer_reviews.title: Quality basket
customer_reviews.text: I’m a new bread baker and I love using this beautiful basket to shape my loaves. It’s well made and works as advertised!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves it

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: I have finally been able to move the proofed loaf onto the stone without having it collapse. Great product! I would definitely recommend adding this item to your kitchen tools.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Schuricht

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. I really like the stencils. The basket is the perfect size. Great company to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Marychris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic product. The Brotss Banneton Proofing basket is high quality. I love the stencils. Photo is of my very first loaf. From a new baker.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but instructions as to how to clean it would be welcome ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sleszynska

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and quality of this banneton! You won't be disappointed with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: michael weaver

customer_reviews.title: ... expected it to be bigger but it will work fine for a smaller loaf
customer_reviews.text: I had expected it to be bigger but it will work fine for a smaller loaf. Great quality and all was included as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Heike B

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my Dad, the bread baker ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Dad, the bread baker. He said he really likes it. Makes his bread more special.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: If you bake bread, buy this now! :-)
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy making sourdough bread but sometimes have trouble getting the loaf to keep its round shape. It flattens out and makes slices about 1"high. With this proofing basket not only does it keep its shape it adds the distinctive markings that make the crust crispy and attractive. The stencils add a little extra fun to doing this. Just fyi--I saw a similar basket of the same size and composition but without the cover, stencils, or e-book at Sur La Table for $35. This is a really nice company to do business with and the product adds a little extra something to bread making. I'm really glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Logan

customer_reviews.title: A MUST-HAVE FOR PROOFING DOUGH
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time yesterday in the final proofing of my sourdough bread. As advertised it works to create marks on the bread which ultimately make for a nice striation when cooked. I also liked the way it does wick out any excess moisture from the dough while proofing, something that a nonporous bowl will not do. I have not used the dinner since I prefer the markings that the basket leaves on the bread. Don't wash it; just shake out the excess flour and store it. A valuable tool for bread making, and I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Circle B Ranch

customer_reviews.title: I love this proving basket (banneton)!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely am crazy about crusty panless breads (sourdough, rarebit, soda bread, etc.) And this basket really helps get an ideal shape and prevents it from collapsing when trying to get my dough on the baking sheet. The linen liner is a great touch to stop dough getting stuck (along with a sprinkling of flour of course). The linen liner is made out of a linen that is finer than my much older couche and does it's job admirably. If you want top notch and consistent loaves I highly recommend this banneton. The included ebook has some great recipes I'm slowly working through too and the included stencils made for some super cute Christmas breaks and cakes.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyAName

customer_reviews.title: Premium Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. All the extras were useful and generous in their purpose. The proofing basket and lining are both of premium quality. Being cautious and just unsure, I purchased a slightly smaller basket than what I actually need. I will purchase a larger one from this company. The company wants to ensure you are satisfied. They provide after-sale follow up email to introduce themselves, offer a free e-book, and contact info should you want/need their assistance. Big Bang for the Buck adage definitely applies!
customer_reviews.author: Pluto AIr

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended but splinters
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to and includes cute stencils and scraper. While the stencils are a little small, it's not a big deal. The reason why it's three stars is because there are some splinters on mine. I've tried washing/smoothing it, but there are still just a few splinters. I've also tried using proofing dough in there (then throwing it away afterwards) in hopes of removing the splinters but to no avail. Instead I just keep the cover on it, which works just fine, but really wanted the look you get without the cover
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: I have been wanting one for a long time and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time. Love the design it leaves on the bread. Dough comes out of bowl easily when sprayed lightly with water and thoroughly floured with rice flour. This product shipped fast, was packaged well, and is well made. There are no flaws in the basket whatsoever. I used the basket liner as a cover while proofing and a stencil to decorate the top of my loaf after scoring. I will get many years of use and have fun while making bread with this bundle. I would highly recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: mawalker33

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price for the quality. The banneton looks every bit as good as my more expensive ones, and this one came with stencils, a cloth cover and a dough scraper. The dough scraper isn't heavy-duty, but it'll be useful. The stencils are cute. The cloth is of a nice, thick material and fits the banneton well. If you want to try a banneton, this is a great price for what looks like a well-made, durable product. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Gift to encourage bread-baking in BF
customer_reviews.text: I got this set to encourage my BF's new bread-making hobby. It has not failed me. He has been making bread everyday. He says the bowl has worked well, although he is a new baker so I cannot say from a professional perspective. It has been surprisingly easy to clean. It has that scraper, too, which is apparently important.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Kadabi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic proofing basket
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried a proofing basket before, this one works perfectly. It helps set the bread in the perfect size shape and texture. Some of the loaves I have baked so far or more likely works of art. Yet we eat them right down
customer_reviews.author: Ken Clements

customer_reviews.title: Now I just need a Starter!
customer_reviews.text: I am just getting into baking bread and wanted my first loaf to look like a traditional loaf. This is the perfect set, it even included stencils so I can dust an attractive design on top...Sweet!
customer_reviews.author: msv419

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I am new at making sourdough bread and when I came across this proofing basket I thought I should try it. It is better than the glass or metal bowls I have , it gives a perfect shape and makes it easy to work with the dough. Dough hardly sticks and with the linen cover you have an all in one system.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Super fast shipping internationally
customer_reviews.text: Got the item in a week for international shipping. Amazing. The bowl is just the right size and the other accessories are great for home use. The stencils work well for cappuccino chocolate powder too
customer_reviews.author: David L. Tong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my bread recipes. Easy to clean-just rinse the liner with water and brush out any particles in the banneton with a brush. Have yet to try the stencils
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Actual banneton is very sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set. The banneton in particular is very sturdy and easy to use. The only downside is the lame. You can’t change the blade and it’s flimsy. Overall this is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Hatmaker

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I enjoy making bread as it is
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I enjoy making bread as it is, but with this little tool it's makes it even more enjoyable! I've used other proofing kits before but none with the same results as the Brotss proofing kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a specific bread I was making. My first use was an epic fail, part stuck in the basket. Second try was better. Initial use directions are not that clear...wipe out basket with a cloth or use a water free spray? Is this like Pam? IDK. Not that easy to use but I will keep trying. Not that easy to get all the flour out after use. What am I doing wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Gram

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 uses! Got rusty even after cleaning and drying. Do not waste your money here. Biggerbolderbaking.com has recipes which don’t require this set at all for the best bread ever.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fagan

customer_reviews.title: They work swell
customer_reviews.text: Look and work good. Nice to try out the design templates.
customer_reviews.author: Flyer

customer_reviews.title: A gift that was much appreciated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a gift for my boyfriend, who's really been enjoying baking with it. The basket and the liner are high-quality, and the spiral pattern that the basket makes on the finished bread is lovely. He hasn't had a chance to use the stencils yet, but we're both excited to see how those turn out. I also appreciate the follow-up from the seller, including the e-book of recipes that they send you.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: This Banneton works really well. I've made a couple of loaves already and it makes me look like a pro. Additional items shipped with this purchase were really helpful. Excellent quality also.
customer_reviews.author: tom purdy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I use this basket twice a week! Makes a beautiful loaf of bread! I love the marks it leaves in the bread! Love the stencils as an added touch for the loaves I make for friends!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice, high quality products. The cloth liner is very nice, basket has good quality. It has dough scraper and cutter. It has 4 bread stencils on the product info, but they send to me 6 of them. Also they follow up the customer very kindly. I felt they put their hearth in the business. Also they emailed ebook too. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: L.O.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Basket.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Basket and also the cover. They made my Bread look so professional. I love they way they look. The price was excellent and packaged very well. My package arrived on the day expected. Thank you Mary Lou
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: I made two sourdough boules yesterday and they are beautifully marked with the rattan pattern
customer_reviews.text: I made two sourdough boules yesterday and they are beautifully marked with the rattan pattern. these are sturdy and beautifully made. the added bonus of the stencils and dough blade was great. There was an added bonus after I bought a second one -- a third almost free! Which of course, I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!  Beginner Sourdough baker...
customer_reviews.text: Took a class in sourdough bread baking and this was exactly what I needed to recreate the efforts at home.
customer_reviews.author: TweetyByrd

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions and it won’t fail. Bread shape was beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery but went to instructions and followed them. Dough came out of banneton perfectly. Made a No-knead whole wheat bread and had to place it in a very hot cast iron kettle. So much easier to use than a flour sack towel. I just ordered 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: On time, great price, for people making and distributing bread.
customer_reviews.text: If you use the liner, you will not get the round lines you want on the bread, but it will keep wet doughs from spreading. Arrived on time, great price, as advertised. Great products for your next step in bread baking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am new to bread baking but the proofing basking really helped me make a beautiful loaf. I am enjoying bread baking
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality basket. I am new to bread baking but the proofing basking really helped me make a beautiful loaf. I am enjoying bread baking. Thank you for the high quality product.

customer_reviews.text: After prep I used the basket, all is good. The package items were as described.
customer_reviews.author: PG Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Proofing Basket!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, perfect size artisan loafs. Love the ringed design it leaves on my breads and how easy the proofed dough pops out of the basket onto my baking stone.

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set for the beginning bread maker or the master. Works great for putting that extra touch to the crust that makes people say "awwwwww"

customer_reviews.text: The best all around items, everything in one place! Will buy again for gifting!!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my basket
customer_reviews.text: Great proofing basket, no problem with dough sticking, just use plenty of rice flour. Sweet touch of added stencils for bread

customer_reviews.text: Lovely baking set for anyone who loves making their own bread. Good size loaf for a smaller family meal.

customer_reviews.text: This was a great value for the money. The lining makes it much easier to release the bread from the banneton. My bread looked and tasted great. See for yourself

product_meta.title: 15 items Banneton kit - Proofing Basket +10 Artisan Stencils +Bread Lame +Cloth Liner Linen+Bowl Scraper for Bakers/Sourdough Recipe, Brotform Rising Making Round Baked Crispy Dough Crust Boules Loaf
feature_bullets: BROTSS GENUINE PACKAGE CONTENT - Rattan Bread Proofing Basket; Bread Lame Scoring Tool with cover; Dough Scraper; Cloth Liner; 10(ten) Different Design Patterns; Digital eBook. This perfect gift for you or for your family and friends will make your bread surprise every time, your loved ones

HEALTHY COOKING - Only natural and organic materials used to make this Banneton Dough Prooving Basket the perfect tool that assures your family daily natural bread, in plus it complies with German Food & Commodity Goods Law – LFGB

TRY ALL RECIPES - proofing basket banneton in just the shape and dimensions needed: 8.66 inches in diameter, 3.15 inches in height, 0.315 inches rattan diameter used that makes every brotform proofing basket very sturdy to be used every day

EACH BANNETON IS UNIQUE – totally handmade product complies with artisan bread bakers demands, the cloth linen is traditionally used to support dough inside the banneton and also to absorb a little moisture from the dough, which helps to form the bread crust

ZERO RISKS - SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – We’re so confident in the quality of our products that we give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you don’t absolutely love your Brotss Banneton bundle, just send it back and we’ll refund you in full.
